12/7/2022, updated on 18/4/2023: TINDAKMALAYSIA NETWORK SERVICES PLT (TINDAK MALAYSIA)

Election Commission of Malaysia (SPR), Tindak Malaysia (2022), Attorney General Chambers, Sinar Harian, Utusan Borneo, Borneo Post, Malaysiakini, Sarawak Voice, Malay Mail, Astro Awani, Bernama, dunsarawak.blogspot, Sarawak ROSE, sisibukit.blogspot.com

There may be discrepancies for the age of candidates as there is no official data released for the attribute.There are many missing data points for age attribute for candidates. There is a mistake Government Gazette made for the total valid votes of the candidates for DUN Tellian. Though Astro Awani claims only 22 women candidates, there is 23 women candidates for the elections. Due to infighting within Pakatan Harapan, there are few seats where DAP and PKR competed against each other. While every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy and completeness of the dataset, TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or omissions arising from the original dataset or its derivatives
FIELD DESCRIPTION
Composite between Parliamentary Code and DUN Code (Unique Identifier)
State Name
Parliamentary Code (2015 - present at the Created Date)
Parliamentary Name (2015 - present at the Created Date)
State Constituency (DUN) Code (2015 - present at the Created Date)
State Constituency (DUN) Name (2015 - present at the created Date)
Party/Coalition (with Component Party) who won the sea
Indicator if there was one contestant for the said election. If yes, value Y is affixed. If none, it is left blank
Total Electors using Principal Electoral Roll (2015) that was certified and gazetted on 9th March 2016 and updated until 10th April 2016
The difference between the highest valid votes and second highest valid votes
Proportion of Total Ballots Issued as a share of Total Electorate
Total number of ballot papers issued at the poll (as in A in all Form 14 + A in Form 15)
Total number of ballot papers issued but not put in the ballot box (as in D in all Form 14) and not returned (as in D in Form 15) (B-C-D)
Total number of rejected ballot papers (as in C in all Form 14 + C in Form 15)
Total number of votes by electors
